visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year, with the series name 'Temperature'. The chart should also have custom colors and additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The x-axis represents the months of the year with styled labels, and the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius with a styled title and labels. The data series is named 'Temperature' and includes the monthly average temperature data. The chart uses a custom color for the series and has a legend enabled with specific styling. Additional configurations disable the credits and navigation buttons, and enable exporting the chart as a PDF with a specific filename. The chart is designed to be visually appealing with consistent color schemes and font sizes.
